"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b5d8563687253fc270100#post_552b5d8563687253fc270100
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b5db46368726c28791900#post_552b5db46368726c28791900
I want to see it in motion! It may just be my bizarre sense of aesthetics, but I tend to love weird off-looking things like that. Just something about how out-of-place and downright alien it looks makes it beautiful to me. That's one of the reasons I love spiders so much. Hell to me the XENOMORPH is nothing less of a masterpiece in motion.

topics.body:
There should be a game where if you die you cant restart the game and your game console crashes and blows up your home and kills you.

Call it "Game of life" Made by Gabe Newel and Kojima And Kamina 

Have it where on each difficulty the explosion is bigger so on easy mode it blows up like a fire cracker and your fine.

Normal mode you lose a lim.

Hard mode you die.

Intense mode it wipes out your entire bloodline.

Your going to hell mode it wipes out your entire town and leaves nothing behind but the sins you left on humanities door step for being shit. 

You caused the end mode summons the Apocalypse and cause the destruction of the entire human race and cause God to reset the universe only for you to do it again and again until god says fuck it wipes out the universe and moves on into an Alt reality where you can never and will never exist.

DLC Mode includes a Pencil to sign your will on.

The Seasons pass gives you the ability to bypass Gods Reality changing by making sure you never die and you will become the destroyer of Existence until someone can stop you. 

Also Dorito's and Mountain Dew comes with Exclusive coverage of a Religious group that will worship the coming of Death in your name. 

~I posted this in the wrong thread and just noticed, Shiet~
